name: Dungeon Depths (ShdwDev)
description:
You play as a mysterious traveler, searching for treasure. Explore the depths of a dungeon forsaken that all but monsters and search for possible riches made through discovery...

Controls:

Move - AD

Jump - Space

Attack - Left Click

Block - Right Click

Aim Attack - WASD

Made in 3 days for Ludum Dare 48
